entry.title: SPECIAL WEATHER STATEMENT, Gogama
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 5:14 a.m. EDT Friday 31 March 2023

entry.title: Friday: Periods of snow. High zero.
entry.summary: Cloudy. Periods of snow beginning early this morning and ending this afternoon. Local amount 2 to 4 cm. Wind becoming northeast 20 km/h late this afternoon. High zero. Wind chill minus 10 this morning. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 5:30 AM EDT Friday 31 March 2023

entry.title: Friday night: Periods of snow. Low minus 9. POP 30%
entry.summary: Cloudy. 30 percent chance of light snow after midnight. Snow at times heavy and local blowing snow beginning overnight. Local amount 2 cm. Wind becoming northeast 30 km/h gusting to 50 after midnight. Low minus 9. Wind chill minus 17 overnight. Forecast issued 5:30 AM EDT Friday 31 March 2023

entry.title: Saturday: Snow at times heavy. High minus 6.
entry.summary: Snow at times heavy and local blowing snow ending in the afternoon then clearing. Amount 10 to 15 cm. Wind north 30 km/h gusting to 60. High minus 6. Wind chill minus 21 in the morning and minus 14 in the afternoon. UV index 3 or moderate. Forecast issued 5:30 AM EDT Friday 31 March 2023

entry.title: Saturday night: Clear. Low minus 17.
entry.summary: Clear. Low minus 17. Forecast issued 5:30 AM EDT Friday 31 March 2023

entry.title: Sunday: Cloudy. High zero.
entry.summary: Increasing cloudiness. High zero. Forecast issued 5:30 AM EDT Friday 31 March 2023

entry.title: Sunday night: Chance of flurries. Low minus 2. POP 60%
entry.summary: Cloudy with 60 percent chance of flurries. Low minus 2. Forecast issued 5:30 AM EDT Friday 31 March 2023

entry.title: Monday: Chance of flurries or rain showers. High plus 2. POP 60%
entry.summary: Cloudy with 60 percent chance of flurries or rain showers. High plus 2. Forecast issued 5:30 AM EDT Friday 31 March 2023

entry.title: Monday night: Chance of flurries. Low minus 11. POP 30%
entry.summary: Cloudy with 30 percent chance of flurries. Low minus 11. Forecast issued 5:30 AM EDT Friday 31 March 2023

entry.title: Tuesday: Cloudy. High minus 2.
entry.summary: Cloudy. High minus 2. Forecast issued 5:30 AM EDT Friday 31 March 2023

entry.title: Tuesday night: Chance of snow. Low minus 4. POP 60%
entry.summary: Cloudy with 60 percent chance of snow. Low minus 4. Forecast issued 5:30 AM EDT Friday 31 March 2023

entry.title: Wednesday: Periods of rain or snow. High plus 2. POP 70%
entry.summary: Cloudy with 70 percent chance of rain or snow. High plus 2. Forecast issued 5:30 AM EDT Friday 31 March 2023

entry.title: Wednesday night: Chance of flurries. Low minus 8. POP 60%
entry.summary: Cloudy with 60 percent chance of flurries. Low minus 8. Forecast issued 5:30 AM EDT Friday 31 March 2023

entry.title: Thursday: Cloudy. High zero.
entry.summary: Cloudy. High zero. Forecast issued 5:30 AM EDT Friday 31 March 2023
